definition: erhua variant of 痰盂[tan2 yu2]

sentences.english: He was such a fan of chewing tobacco that brass spittoons were installed in the White House.
sentences.chinese: 他嗜烟如命，以至于把黄铜质的痰盂都放在白宫。

sentences.english: Please wash your mouth and spit out the water into the spittoon.
sentences.chinese: 已经注射好了，请漱漱口，吐到痰盂中。

sentences.english: Door hind has one cuspidor, there is liquid of many courage and uprightness inside, periphery has drop record bloodstain.
sentences.chinese: 门后有一痰盂，内有大量血性液体，周边有滴状血迹。

sentences.english: Now you've gotten the injection. Please wash your mouth and spit out the water into the  spittoon.
sentences.chinese: 已经注射好了，请漱漱口，吐到痰盂中。

sentences.english: Many of the spittoons were decorated with colorful floral patterns.
sentences.chinese: 很多痰盂的表面都装饰着彩色的花朵图案。

sentences.english: Now you've gotten the injection. Please wash your mouth and spit out the water into the spittoon.
sentences.chinese: 已经注射好了，请漱漱口，吐到痰盂中。

sentences.english: It's a pity that the spitbox in the pit was hit and split.
sentences.chinese: 遗憾的是西方经济学论文坑内的痰盂被打裂。

sentences.english: Then he pushed the spittoon with the tip of his shoe, and went to wash his hands in the washbasin.
sentences.chinese: 接着他用鞋尖往前踢了踢痰盂，在盥洗池里洗了手。

definition: washbowl/basin for washing hands and face
washbowl/basin for washing hands and face/CL:個|个[ge4]
chamber pot/wooden pan used as toilet/toilet bowl
